tool_description: Identifies and tracks trending topics, hashtags, and content themes across social media platforms to inform content strategy.
error_messages: Invalid platforms: Each platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Empty platform list: At least one platform must be specified
Invalid timeframe: Timeframe must be one of [1h, 6h, 24h, 7d]
Location not found: Specified location is not supported for trend tracking
usage: Specify platforms to track trends on. Optionally add keywords for focused tracking, location for regional trends, and timeframe for trend duration.

trend_scores.description: Trending scores (0-100) for each identified trend
